message: Let's split it down the middle. It's the fairest way to do it.
Come on, I gave up a bit!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bigger share to make up for the inflation.  Let's try 55/45.
Inflation is hitting you hard, don't wait!
I'm willing to go all in on a 60/40 split.  It's a fair compromise given the inflation rate, and we need to settle soon before we both lose even more.

We're running out of time, and I'm losing money quickly.  Let's settle on a 65/35 split.  It's the best we can do at this point.

I'm willing to go all in for a 70/30 split.  We're almost out of time, and I'm losing a huge amount to inflation.  This is my final offer.
